house_listing.house_description: Enjoyable country living. This split-level 3 bdrm, 2.5 bath home with 2 dining areas, 3 living areas, and a 2 car garage overlooks beautiful rolling coastal pature land. The traditional style home features built-in cabinets, a woodburning fireplace with gas starter, wet bar, wine closet, exterior lighting system, satellite dish, & much more. Fencing & cross-fencing, barn, workshop, loafing shed, & an amazing tank stocked with bass, perch, & catfish, are just a few more reasons this property is perfect for you!! Call today!
